mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.wms.accumulo

Class ServerRenderOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.wms.accumulo.ServerRenderOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable

    public class ServerRenderOptions
extends Object
implements Persistable
    This class persists and encapsulates all of the main rendering information for a layer (any render configuration that is not self-contained within a single style). It contains the master image to which all labels will be rendered on.

                                     int height,
                                     boolean transparent)
        Sets up a BufferedImage.TYPE_4BYTE_ABGR if the paletteInverter is not provided, or a indexed image otherwise. Subclasses may override this method should they need a special kind of image
